title: Chili Peppers
itunes:title: Chili Peppers
description:
In this episode, Bobby & Sophie examine the wonderful world of chili peppers. Tune in to hear Sophie's favorite pepper, how Bobby makes mole, and of course, Bobby cooks Sophie a delicious snack that could satisfy any chili pepper fan.

For more information on "Always Hungry", follow the hosts on Instagram:

Bobby Flay's page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay's page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
